entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level 700 metres. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 700 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023
